item.description:
Hey everyone,

I was thinking of instead of scrambling to find a restaurant that can have us for dinner, let's plan this ahead.  We will be trying the Reservation system again.  With the Reservation system, we'll know who is going and our choices in restaurants to have dinner at will increase.  We are always open for suggestions on places to eat at for future Saturday Dinner meetups.

This week's Dinner after the Pru will be held at Giacomo's in the Backbay.

 

Here's the link to their menu:

http://giacomosblog-boston.blogspot.com/2007/04/menu-for-giacomos-northend-restaurant.html
item.how_to_find_us: We will be leaving around 6:15 pm. We will walk to our destination, since Giacomo's is a couple blocks away.
item.name: Dinner after our Pru Meetup
